name: Meteor Fight
description:
Welcome to Meteor Fight!

You have a horde of space monsters descending upon your craft. Your goal is to survive the horde or DIE trying!!! Collect power-ups to help stave off the onslaught! Think you can keep the crew alive while in deep space? If so, this is the app for you!!!

Features
----------
- Simple controls, tap to fire the cannon
- Awesome graphics and sound effects!!!
- Great power-ups!!!
- In app purchases

Version 1.x : Space Shooter
Version 2.x: Story mode - COMING SOON!

Join the Meteor Fight!!! #beinspiredblue

*Royalty-Free music by BenSound*
